website_summaries.verdict: A mini bolt cutter that is easy to handle and can cut through several metals with ease.
pros: Use this convenient tool on any tool site, as it's easy to carry around
It features double-heat-treated CrMo blades that ensure it's tough enough to cut through a variety of materials
It's designed to do a lot of the work for you, so you can save yourself some exertion
And the ergonomic grip makes it easy to handle
cons: It's small, so don't expect it to handle the bigger, more stubborn materials

website_summaries.verdict: Gets the job done at a high level, with an ability to cut through wires, rods, bolts, and chains.
pros: Tough materials are no match for this tool, which features double-heat-treated CrMo blades
Its design helps you gain leverage, despite its smaller size
The ergonomic grips maximize comfort for the user
cons: A little too mini to get through nails or screws

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for cutting stainless steel tig wire. They work great so far and have easily cut through 5/32 wire. I also own a pair of knipex mini bolt cutters and can honestly say these are of comparable quality. Time will tell how well they hold up, but I feel confident in saying these should hold up to many years of use. Also for the musky fisherman, these would be a great addition to your release tools if you don't have a pair of good hook cutters. I plan to purchase another pair for backups in the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting pliers, I love knipex pliers for ease of cutting but given the price and lifespan of how quickly blades chip ruducing cutting area of blade I've opted for Capri mini golf cutters instead. It takes more grip effort to use but it cuts well and has a much longer lifespan that other cutting plier. A spring assist to open would really speed up one handed use but it's not a deal breaker. For the price and lifespan i would highly recommend these pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost has good as the Knipex...
customer_reviews.text: They work just has good as my Knipex set. But the Knipex are easier to handle with one hand. The handle on these are comfortable ,but are too bulky for one handed opening and closing. I may remove the rubber handles and dip them...
customer_reviews.author: H.Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not very big.
customer_reviews.text: Works good but depends on what you need it for. The opening is not very wide so you can only cut small things. If you're getting this to cut chains I probably wouldn't. You're either gonna have to do it in sections or not at all. Thats the price you pay for portability. Works great on anything you can fit in the mouth. Still a good bolt cutter though.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Need help unlocking tool bar to use it! Otherwise, GREAT TOOL and can't wait to use it for many, many items!
customer_reviews.text: I'd love it but I'm not technially a "pro" and can't figure out how to undo the bolt cutter from its "safe" packaging and actually work with the bolt cutter. Would you please email me how to undo the bar that keeps the bolt cutter sides together so I can use it? I hope you can understand my vague explanation. It looks like when I get that determination, I will never be able to live without this handy, strong, obviously well-made tool. What a find for me - now to be able to use it! If you need assistance contacting me, I hope Amazon can help. I surely need yours! Anxious to use this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E Reek

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about these...
customer_reviews.text: I’m unsure about the quality of these and if they really are made of the super hard alloy the description claims. I received them yesterday and used them to cut one rather small fish hook. The paint chipped off the cutter jaws at the spot the cut was made and the jaws deformed slightly. See the pics. You can clearly see the paint chip and the deformation of the jaws that now let light through when firmly squeezed closed. Not sure if I have a defective pair or not. I’m going to ask the seller. At this point I wish I had spent about 20 dollars more and bought a higher end product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This tool appears well made and did the job I needed it for, cutting some 1/4" bicycle lock cable into sections. No problem, no damage to tool, cut through easily. As for "bolt cutting"? I'm not betting on it. Other job it will do fine is cut the barbs off any fishing hooks that get impaled in me or my friends while out on boat.
customer_reviews.author: drlarryw

customer_reviews.title: Honestly blown away.
customer_reviews.text: I work at an industrial steel wire manufacturing company, on any giving day I use these for two hundred cuts on wire ranging from as big as 9G and as small as 12G. These things are light and versatile, I am able to get much more work done after retiring my old cutters, these things cut better than the full sized cutters at the warehouse!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent cutter for smaller bolts
customer_reviews.text: i had to cut some toilet bowl bolts and didnt have alot of room for long handle bolt cutters these worked out well but i have to say you have to have strong grip little old lady would never be able to cut bolts with these and after using them the jaws were still ok not indented from cutting bolts
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect. I already had a pair for cutting thick ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who has arthritis, and has trouble cutting wire for her floral arrangements. These were perfect. I already had a pair for cutting thick wire, so we both use this cutter. The price is less than half than the local big box stock, and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: R. C Jebe

customer_reviews.title: Great little cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little bolt cutter. I cut a lot of RG45 gas welding rod and these work great up to 1/8", it gets a little tougher after that but they will cut 5/32 and 3/16 but it takes more effort, I have a bigger pair of the same brand for cutting the larger stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hager

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product. It does not do half of what is promised in the advertisement. At first I thought that there was some protective cover over the blades, but realized that this tool was useless except for the smallest wire of piece of metal. Calling it a "mini-bolt cutter" is a BIG Stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job so far
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this quite a bit to cut old silverware for art projects. It cuts with no problems. Seems sturdy and well built. Yet to be determined how long it will hold up as we've only used it for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to shave small size bolts down first thought get a hack saw? Didn’t want the mess so I ordered this It cut through the bolts like butter, job done in seconds! Wish I purchased Long time ago
customer_reviews.author: Dr chadmodrincodboinger

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: It's a pair of bolt cutters, it's easy to operate, cuts the big wire I need it for, handles are padded so it's easy on the hands, and does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a better description would be nano pico cotton thread cutter
customer_reviews.text: Mini BOLT cutter? No way! Maybe a better description would be nano pico cotton thread cutter! Then, again, maybe not.as they could not even cut miniature 2mm hobby bolts. With AMAZONS new policy on returns looks like I may be stuck!
customer_reviews.author: TRIKE

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for cutting screws poking thru the ceiling.
customer_reviews.text: We had screws poking thru a low ceiling and needed to cut them. This tool worked well so now I don't have to worry about any head injuries in that area!
customer_reviews.author: eyelikecake

customer_reviews.title: The Right Tool
customer_reviews.text: I used it to cut a chain link fence. It works effortlessly. It's well made; the right size; and exactly what I needed for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Major Tom

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, This is The Best Mini Bolt Cutter Under $30
customer_reviews.text: If you need a mini bolt cutter and you have $50 budget, look no further get a German made Knipex CoBolt. This is probably the best tool money can buy. But if your budget is $30, look no further get this Capri Klinge. The design is rather similar to the Knipex. Quality is solid and very comfortable. It is simply the best value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VALUE for the price! Most guys I work with use Klein or knipex, but they were all impressed by this brand when I let them test them.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: works well for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: I have put these to work on lots of rusty old, thick barbed wire and new electric fence wire. So far they have cut everything with ease and I really like the way they fit in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: JRadd

customer_reviews.title: Cut threw the nails it needed it to
customer_reviews.text: Was helping my brother redo his fire place mantle and we had some nails coming through a board we’re not replacing so I ordered these hoping they would cut the nails. They cut them no problem! There’s slight warping on the blades now but we cut about 20 nails so it’s expected. Great household tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't found anything that cuts like the KNIPEX cutters
customer_reviews.text: If you think you are getting a less expensive version of the KNIPEX you are wrong. I cut a lot of heavy wire, up to 10.5 GA and with these Klinge cutters it's a two handed operation. I haven't found anything that cuts like the KNIPEX cutters...... although they are almost twice the cost of these.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performace wise... Almost identical to knipex
customer_reviews.text: This tool cuts exactly like knipex. There is no difference in my eyes. As for twisting wires... a bit of a struggle if you have to tie down something complex. But workable... I'd still recommend you to get these. If you have a pair of klein pliers and these... you're good to go. These are a great alternative to the knipex for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Knipex for half the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cutting filler rod during tig welding. They work just as well as the more expensive Knipex mini bolt cutters but for half the cost. The handle is more comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the Knipex bolt cutter but does the job. Wish the handles were skinner though.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cutting StayTuff, TaTite50 Fencing Wire products
customer_reviews.text: After cutting 15.5 to 12.5 GA Class 3 Galvanized wire for many years with the cheaply made mini bolt cutters, I finally decided to find a high quality made tool for the job. Thanks to Capri Tools. I say that this are the right Mini Bolt Cutters, Tuff and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jose DeSantiago

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my tacklebox just never know when you need to cut a hook off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my tacklebox just never know when you need to cut a hook off
customer_reviews.author: MNfiremanJIm

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter for those with arthritic or weakened hands.
customer_reviews.text: These wire cutters end the hassle of cutting heavy gauge or hard wire. The built in mechanical advantage makes it easy to cut heavy gauge or hard wire.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Otto

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Th is item was very helpful to me for the job I needed it for. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: irene nelson

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a simple tool that was easy to grasp and would cut through chain quickly and easily. This works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: G. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Capri Tools 40209 Klinge Mini Bolt Cutter, 8"
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty Cuts field fence wire with ease. I do beleave they will last a very long time well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Joe E

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the same as the Knipex cutters, but for the price, I'll buy more when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Nice Tool
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy, the jaws meet very well, and there have been no dents from cutting spring wire or anything else I have thrown at it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary tool. Makes cutting chain super easy will little effort. I've bought two pairs for myself and family and will be purchasing a third pair shortly. Super glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: ReadsAlot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pliers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used knipex and you honestly wouldn’t be doing yourself any favors by spending twice the money. These work great and cut with little to no effort just like knipex pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I Love how much smaller it is compared to the traditional bolt cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Bayer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This guy is a champion at cutting rolled steel boning to make corsets! It took awhile to find the right tool for the job, but this is it. It is solid, easy to use, and super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Iafrate

customer_reviews.title: This is the first tool I found that cut through it easily with little effort
customer_reviews.text: I needed something very strong so I could cut the steel boning for my corsets. This is the first tool I found that cut through it easily with little effort. Has made my life so much easier. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pena

customer_reviews.title: The little tool that could.
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is ridiculous. Most used seal cutter in my side box.
customer_reviews.author: bill flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut nails or screws
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have the double swivel strength to cut nails or screws. Straight out of the package I tested them and they failed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set...save your diagonals and linesman pliers and get a set of these for the Hard stuff like nails etc.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zink

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So far they seem quite capable and cut very well. My only complaint is the jaws do not open very much. Other than that they work well

customer_reviews.title: Good nips
customer_reviews.text: Not as hard as they should be need to be harder

customer_reviews.title: so far so good i have been using them for fence work that ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good i have been using them for fence work that is my second job on weekends works just as good as knipex hopefully the dont break but should have a ten year warranty from what i read
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut away a wire topiary from an old wisteria plant. worked like a charm with minimal effort despite my having a bit of arthritis in my

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Very easy on the hands, it is limited in the cutter (handle opening) size but that's stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: TMVA

customer_reviews.title: high leverage as good as my KLIEN or KNIPEX and less than half ...
customer_reviews.text: well built ,high leverage as good as my KLIEN or KNIPEX and less than half the money ,will buy more as soon as they lose these !

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Stuff Well
customer_reviews.text: Cuts bolts and other small metals in half without much effort. Comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a month.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to cut seals off of trailers. The thinner steel cables on the seals were no problem at all the heavier gauge was not a problem at first but now it doesn't cut them any longer. I was hoping there was a way to sharpen them or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: joe clegg

customer_reviews.title: I should have used these earlier.
customer_reviews.text: The mini bolt cutters are the best for cutting thick plastic stems. The cut very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Blair

customer_reviews.title: Regardless they made easy work of replacing the hooks
customer_reviews.text: I used it to cut the eyes off of saltwater stainless steel hooks. These were large saltwater hooks and owing to the eyelet on plugs I had to use the very end of the cutter blades. Regardless they made easy work of replacing the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for cutting thick cable seals they work great
customer_reviews.author: Rob Flogel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Don't have a chance to wear them out.I keep giving them to my friends.Everyone loves them.Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Great bolt cutters just need a spring in the handle.
customer_reviews.text: Great little bolt cutter but they need a spring in the handle to assist in opening.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a high quality tool .
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my hand , 2 days on the job and I am very happy I got it !

customer_reviews.title: Blades broke
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of use one of the blades were completely chipped on the top from normal use. I’d get the $15 kobalt before I purchase these again.

customer_reviews.text: very handy to cut stiff control rod in my rc planes. compact enough to get inside to the wires

customer_reviews.text: I didnt expect the jaws to get damaged after cutting off one size 8 screw the day after it was delivered.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through the wire easily.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for cutting my tig wire. Cuts through the wire easily.

customer_reviews.text: I had them for only two weeks and they broke. Was only cutting 12.5 gauge wire for my traps. 🤔

customer_reviews.title: I used this tool several times and was amazed at how easy it was to cut screws as ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this tool several times and was amazed at how easy it was to cut screws as well as metal wiring on undersink baskets.

customer_reviews.title: I cut the heads off of #10 type 18-8 Stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: I cut the heads off of #10 type 18-8 Stainless screws on the unthreaded part. works well with minimal wear.
customer_reviews.author: John See

customer_reviews.title: All my production women love it. They say it is easy on the ...
customer_reviews.text: All my production women love it. They say it is easy on the hands and cuts wire really easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price I would recommend this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well . Good product for the price I would recommend this product to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bolt cutters!
customer_reviews.text: Someone in my family "lost" my small Craftsman bolt-cutter & I couldn't find a replacement on Sears' website. So - I ordered three of the cheaper Capri 40107 bolt cutters to distribute amongst the various drawers/boxes where my family keeps tools. THEN I ordered this deluxe version for myself, that I will keep hidden. It is a fine, strong cutting tool - and I am sure I will get a very long life out of it, so long as I maintain control over it! Shipping was fast, too!
customer_reviews.author: BeenThere

customer_reviews.title: mediocre product for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: If you only occasionally need to cut wire or metal I believe that this product would be more than adequate. I cut wire from 1mm to 4mm and made of plain and stainless steel daily and these had several gouges in the teeth after only a few days. I believe these weren't made for heavy use. For heavy use I highly suggest knippex brand mini bolt cutters.
customer_reviews.author: J. Elwood

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great for a PowerLineman if they opened up just a little bigger compared them to knipexs version and it is basically identical jaws seem to be hardened and cuts through hard metal wires that fit in the jaws with ease good product.
customer_reviews.author: charles medlen

customer_reviews.title: Get the power of a bolt cutter in the palm of your hand
customer_reviews.text: These are leaps and bounds strong than regular cutters. It's like a micro bolt cutter in one hand - I'm able to snip 1/8" pins like they were zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.text: Will NOT cut 3/8" stranded wire cable. Had to "nibble" at the side and work my way through.

customer_reviews.title: These things cut through 3/32" galvanized steel rope so easily that it felt like nothing happened – it's harder ...

customer_reviews.title: These make steel turn to butter!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Every time I had to cut braided steel cables (even as small as 1/16), I used my ordinary wire cutters and had a really hard time getting through it. When I tried with these, it went through like a hot knife through butter! Good tools make work so much more enjoyable.

product_meta.title: Capri Tools CP40209 40209 Klinge Mini Bolt Cutter, 8", Blue/Black
product_meta.description: The Capri Tools Klinge Mini Bolt Cutter takes everything great about our excellent bolt cutters and makes it portable. You can carry this 8 inch bolt cutter around in your pocket and easily cut through wires, threaded rods, bolts, chains, and more. The double heat treated CrMo blades cut through tough materials with a vengeance. It is specifically designed to give you high leverage and to give you more force with less effort. The soft grip handles are also very comfortable and secure to give you an ergonomic experience when you use them.
feature_bullets: Easily cut through wires, threaded rods, bolts, chains, and more
Extremely handy for cutting on the go
Double heat treated CrMo blades cut through tough materials with a vengeance
High leverage design gives you more force with less effort
Specially designed ergonomic grips make these cutters comfortable and secure

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars305 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
